name: Dummyball
description: SPECIAL creates a DUMMY when it explodes and deals 155% damage
Has no effect if the max number of DUMMIES are already active

name: Rocket Science
description: DASH can be held for up to 1 second(s), dealing 32 damage along its path and applying IGNITE to all enemies hit
Crossed DUMMIES catch fire and increase their attack rate by 25% for 5 seconds

name: Twin Dummies
description: TRAIT has 55% chance to build two DUMMIES at once

name: Unstable Cores
description: 5 seconds after their creation, DUMMIES become UNSTABLE
If an unstable DUMMY is hit with POWER - or if it is destroyed or dismantled - this will cause it to explode, dealing 80 area damage

name: Nailing Strike
description: Adds an additional strike to ATTACK combo, dealing 400% damage

name: Oiled Mechanisms
description: DUMMIES hit by Geppetto's ATTACK immediately attack in their current position, dealing 50% damage

name: Heart Ties
description: DUMMIES gain 40% of Geppetto's VITALITY
Geppetto gains +5 ARMOR per active DUMMY

name: Large Family
description: Increase maximum active DUMMIES by 1
TRAIT has a 10% reduced cooldown

name: Forked Lightning
description: DEFENSE send bolts of lightning out towards DUMMIES, each one dealing 40 damage

name: Mourning Rage
description: Whenever a DUMMY is destroyed, Geppetto and other DUMMIES gain STRENGTH for 4 seconds

name: Explosive Builds
description: When built by TRAIT, DUMMIES emit a blast, dealing 40 area damage

name: Pogo-Hoppers
description: DUMMIES move 100% farther when attacking

name: Flux Capacitor
description: While Geppetto has SHIELD, POWER affects all DUMMIES within range and deals +20% damage

name: Clockwork Medicine
description: DUMMIES healed by SPECIAL also gain +8 REGENERATION

name: Fireworks
description: Each time a DUMMY regains 30% of its Maximum Health, it shoots a homing missile that deals 15 damage to a nearby enemy

name: Laser Lenses
description: When the DEFENSE effect is applied, DUMMIES' next attack shoots lasers from their eyes, dealing 200% ranged damage

name: Family Meeting
description: When three or more DUMMIES are active, Geppetto and DUMMIES gain +20% ATTACK SPEED

name: Vacuum Capsule
description: DUMMIES hit by SPECIAL are jerked toward the center of the explosion, dealing 40% of POWER damage along the way

name: Magnetic Hammer
description: Holding POWER allows Geppetto to pull in a DUMMY in front of him
Upon release, the DUMMY that has been pulled in deals +40% damage across a 100% wider area

name: Sharp Noses
description: DUMMIES have a 50% chance of attacking with their nose, dealing 160% damage on all enemies they hit

name: Flash of Genius
description: Instantly create 1 random Magical Object(s)
Each upgrade to this talent will create an additional item

name: Lightning Rod Dummies
description: After 2-2.5 seconds of DEFENSE is applied, DUMMIES are struck by lightning and deal 36 damage around

name: Bomb Reserve
description: When in combat, PUPPET sends a bomb around itself every 1 second(s), dealing 40 area damage

name: High Voltage
description: After a DUMMY is displaced by POWER, it activates the Overclock effect of the ULTIMATE for 1 second(s)

name: Master Puppet
description: When the Meca-Puppet is built, it consumes any DUMMY built around to gain 20% max health and deal 10% more damage per DUMMY consumed

name: Hyperclock
description: DUMMIES under the Overclock effect overheat, applying IGNITE to enemies hit, and lastly, explode to deal 80 area damage
